name: You Are Nothing
description:
Simple Dark-Light puzzle, maybe philosophical too, game created for Ludum Dare 45. Theme: Start with nothing.

Solve 6 puzzles to know your truth.

Controls:

Move: W-A-S-D

Reset Level: R

Credits:

Programming: Sefirost, Romina Barbosa, Nicolas Puccio

Music: Francisco Gimenez
